root.title: torchmark tmk author stock repurchas
root.body: torchmark corp say board author purchas time time signific portion pct convert subordin debentur As februari 25 say outstand 150 mln dlr princip amount debenur the compani also say plan redeem debentur june eight It also declar regular quarterli dividend 25 ct per share common payabl may one sharehold record april 10
